== dictionaries/rougail/00-base.yml

[,yaml]
----
version: '1.1'
leader:
  description: a leadership
  type: leadership
  leader:  # a leader
  follower1: value  # a follower
  follower2:
    description: a second follower
    default:
      jinja: |
        {{ _.follower1 }}
      description: returns follower1 value
----
